name: Wall Ball (Luna_Mae_Bae)
description:
Goal:
There's no end! Just survive as long as you can without being hit!
Place walls to protect yourself and earn points!

Mechanics:
- If a bullet bounces off a player-placed wall, you get a point.
- Collect hearts around the map to regenerate lost health.
- Getting hit by a bullet decreases your health.
- Question Marks are power ups that randomize bullet speeds when picked up. Dare to take the risk?

Tips & Tricks:
- Don't get cornered! Bullets may bounce between you and the wall causing you to lose almost instantly.
- Try to trap a bullet in a corner for basically infinite points (though it's super hard to pull off).
- Bullets are faster than you, don't try to outrun them.

Keyboard Controls:
WASD + Arrow Keys - General movement.
Right click - Place wall.

Gamepad Controls:
Left Analog Stick - General movement.
Right Analog Stick - Rotation.
"A" Button - Place wall.
